thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 28 of 574
thread.title: Allison Minchew

author: Allison Minchew
title: Allison Minchew
text: Everything is great and awesome quality! The compression leggings are the absolute best! They're so comfortable and very flattering to your curves in all the right places! And they are the very few that I have bought that are squat approved! I've tried several pairs before and they were not so forgiving on doing squats without the rear shinning through! I work out 7x a week so I'll definitely be stocking up on these leggings as much as possible!
